name: College Sex - Episode 4
description:
A visual novel series about the sex lives of two college girls. In this episode, they go on a double date at a nightclub that is about to be opened.
GAME DESCRIPTION
College Sex is a new visual novel series that follows the story of two attractive young women and their naughty experiences in college.

Ivy tells her roommate that Simon invited them both to hang out with one of his teammates.
Jade is taken by surprise by the alleged double date, but accepts anyway.
Arrived at the location, everyone starts drinking and having a good time.
Things get a little crazy and what follows after that… we leave it to you to discover!

We promise you a steamy story with high-definitions graphics and realistic-looking characters.
